Vamprah::

"After they capture me.. they use me to steal information ans stuff 
like that... " continued Vamprah "And they was tranning me to start a 
career like Killer. I don't know why but they commanded at Darkfate 
that we had to give a trip towards past Earth, this would be a sort 
final test... Althought I don't know why they had to choose that old 
fossil 'cause he was the first enemie that I have... And I have 
confess that I didn't be a good girl with him... after all I make him 
more trouble that you can guess."

"That's synopsis of my story..." said Vamprah 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...>

are

me
